name: you are lost
description:
This is our entry for the Ludum Dare 31 Jam competition.

You are lost in the cold and dark forest but somehow have to make your way out.

Only the bonfires will protect you from the cold and the hungry wolves.

The morning dawns brighter the closer you are to the edge of the woods.

Think twice before running. It cools you down faster and attracts the wolves even more.

Made with phaser in 72 hours for the ludum dare jam 31

by @farwyler, @shakemeluzifer, @bmuig
